text: Gustavo Peña Velasco (22 November 1942 – 19 January 2021) was a Mexican football defender and manager. He was born in Talpa de Allende, Mexico. He made 82 appearances for the national football team between 1961 and 1974. Peña died on 19 January 2021, aged 78.Falleció Gustavo Halcón Peña, símbolo de Cruz Azul y de la Selección mexicana ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Mexican footballers Category:Mexican football managers
title: Gustavo Peña
